title: Apple A11 Processor: An expert take on the new iPhone chip
description: ![]()### LG CLOi robots in action – from cute personal assistants to industrialfloor care](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/lg-cloi-robot-3600210 "LG CLOi robots inaction – from cute personal assistants to industrial floor care")  * The A11 Bionic includes a faster image signal processor for better cameraperformance, better pixel processing and better noise reduction.**Related:[iPhone launch livestream](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/iphone-launch-event-live-stream-time-watch-online-apple-september-12-3286290)**Big.LITTLE-like designs aren’t unique to Apple’s chip designs; the likes ofthe Samsung Exynos 8895 and the Qualcomm [Snapdragon835](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/snapdragon-835-phones-processor-specs-speed-benchmark-chipset-cores-2944086) SoC feature this sort ofarchitecture. But what’s new here is the doubling of the number of lower-powerprocessors, which nobody else has done yet. It’ll be interesting to seewhether Apple is able to improve battery life by shunting off more tasks tothe lower-power cores. We had big complaints about the battery life on theiPhone 7, so it’s here where the A11 Bionic’s power -saving will be mostapparent.When benchmark results start rolling in, we’ll update this page.**Related:[Best iPhone](https://www.trustedreviews.com/guide/best-iphone)****Let us know what you think of Apple’s new A11 chip by tweeting us@TrustedReviews.**
